name: Sparty Warrior
description:
Sparty Warrior game has a few main features  implmented with basic skills and begginer courses and tutorials in the web.

The main features are:

1 - Collect coins

2 - Avoid or jump in enemies

3 - Punch enemies 

4 - Pick up arrows

5 - Throw arrows in enemies

6 - Go for the Rose! 

7 - Kill the Boss

The Boss fight is based on Brackeys tutorials on youtube.

This game is a part of study course project and it provided a lot of scripting resources  which will be refactored and become cleaner in future games.


You can download the boss asset I made in pixel art.
There are all animations including the transformation.
